FuncDef: This command configures the address ranges of the multicast groups for this router. When there are parameters present, the command configures the SSM group ranges for IPv6 addresses and netmasks.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP prefix in dotted decimal notation for the range used by the ABR to advertise that summarizes the area into another area ipv6-prefix. Values-ipv4-prefix:.
Specifies the subnet mask in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).
